A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Nothing about The Last Jedi was serious. It's like an alien\, who knows basically what starwars is but has never seen a movie\, went off and made a starwars movie. The plot was weak\, the humor was tasteless\, porgs we're freaking annoying\, Been Solo is not the villain we are looking for\, and I could have gotten past the shoddy choreography\, had the movie not been riddled with other problems.
